Script for Teacher

Global script GlobalScript

[TEAC1] Teacher: Quiet down now children.
[TEAC2] Teacher: Today is the semicentennial of the heroic action performed by our school's namesake.
[TEAC3] Teacher: Yes, 50 years ago today, Wilfred Underfoot saved thousands aboard Flight 623.
[TEAC4] Teacher: And just this morning, the actual footage, taken from the ship's A.I., has been released to the public.
[TEAC5] Teacher: So children, pull out your tablets, and swipe to video link 523.
[TEAC6] Teacher: And let us watch the happenings of March 1, 2088.

Room 99 – Credits

[TEAC7] Teacher: Wow! Wilfred and Samantha truely saved the day!
[TEAC8] Teacher: Turns out the ship's saboteur was a member of an anti-Martian organization.
[TEAC9] Teacher: Wilfred and Samantha would go on to fly over 2,000 space flights together.
[TEAC10] Teacher: Wilfred became the official part of the AmaNAS-X flight crew, and awarded a Martian medal of heroism.
[TEAC11] Teacher: To this day he holds the most flights taken by a cat.
[TEAC12] Teacher: What a kitty!
